input_text: Fix Netlify 404 error on page refresh for React SPA routing
purposed_plan: Create Netlify configuration to handle client-side routing for React SPA. Need to add _redirects file in public folder with rule /* /index.html 200 to ensure all routes are handled by React Router. This fixes 404 errors when directly accessing URLs like /manifesto, /quiz, /token-info etc. Also consider adding netlify.toml for more advanced configuration.
implementation_notes: Updates being implemented on feature branch
